context: Something that ________ hangs in the air, the way a helicopter might ________ over a field before landing. ________ can also mean to hang over in a slightly threatening way. During an exam, your teacher might ________ over a student she suspects of cheating.

Something that hovers hangs in the air, the way a helicopter might hover over a field before landing. Hover can also mean to hang over in a slightly threatening way. During an exam, your teacher might hover over a student she suspects of cheating.
